entry.title: $2145 // NO FEE + 2 FREE MONTHS Loft-Like 2 Bed in Prime Bushwick
entry.content: Welcome to 365 Knickerbocker Ave in Bushwick - a massive converted loft in the heart of Brooklyn. This renovated apartment features over-sized windows, stunning hardwood floors, 14ft ceilings, and a renovated kitchen with lots of counter space. Both bedrooms easily fit queen size beds and have windows and nice size closets. The apartment also features a recently renovated bathroom. All of this and just 5 mins to the L at DeKalb Avenue, and the M train at Knickerbocker/Myrtle. Not to mention an array of incredible bars, restaurants, and more throughout the neighborhood. Welcome home! *No Pets**OFFERING 2 MONTHS FREE ON A 14 MONTH LEASE - NET RENT LISTED - GROSS RENT IS $2500*
